data.title: Arena Soldier & Family Entertainment Center
data.meta_description: Enter the Arena, Caserma Ederle's dining & entertainment destination. Located near the Football Field, the Arena provides a very hip, friendly and fun atmosphere. Enjoy two-stories complete with 16 Bowling Lanes & Pro Shop, Lions' Den Lounge & Sports Bar, Video Arcades & Slots, PLUS Party & Conference Rooms!
data.text:
Welcome to the Arena, Caserma Ederle's favorite dining & entertainment location. The Arena provides a hip, fun and friendly atmosphere with 16 lanes of bowling, a pro shop, Strike Zone Snack Bar, the Lion's Den Sports Bar plus party rooms and meeting space with full service catering available through the Golden Lion Conference Center.

Want to make reservations for bowling lanes?

If you would like to make reservations for bowling lanes, please reach out to us by phone during our regular business hours.

Pleaste Note:

We now accept both Dollars ($) and Euro (â‚¬) at the Arena!

No outside food or beverage is permitted. The only exception is cakes for birthday parties.

Strike Zone Snack Bar

We've merged our online menu with the Vicenza MWR To Go App.

Not only can you find out what food we offer, you can also order it ahead of time so it's ready and waiting when you arrive!

To install the app you can visit the following links:

Google Play Store

Apple App Store

Birthday Party Package

Come celebrate your birthday or the birthday of your children at the Arena! Stop by to coordinate a custom party and to find out about pricing.

Note: Cakes & cupcakes can be brought by customer but no other outside food or beverages are allowed.

The Lion's Den

Join the fun at the Lion's Den Lounge & Sports Bar, situated upstairs in the Arena and overlooking the bowling lanes below. Enjoy a drink with friends on our outdoor patio, enjoy some pool, or play the slots in our game room.

The Lion's Den is also home to multiple bands throughout the year as well as Armed Forces Entertainment tours!

Party Rooms and Meeting Spaces

Verona Room

The Verona Room is located upstairs in the Arena Entertainment Center. It is available Monday through Friday from 8 a.m.-5 p.m. and evenings and weekends.

Capacity Classroom Theater 75 80

Concourse

The Concourse is located upstairs in the Arena Entertainment Center. Available Monday through Friday from 8 a.m.-4 p.m.

Capacity Classroom 150

V.I.P. Room

The VIP Room is located on the main level of the Arena Entertainment Center. It is available Monday through Friday from 8 a.m.-5 p.m. and weekends in four hour increments.

Capacity Classroom Theater 15 20

For room pricing, contact us!

Room prices include room set-up and table cloths/skirting.

Additional party rooms and meeting spaces with full service catering are available through the Golden Lion Conference Center.
